AUTORESPONDER.GUIDE:
This is your control center to manage autoresponders in **{{guild}}!** To get started, check the available actions below. {{emoji}}
{{statusEmoji}} The AR module currently is **{{status}}**.

╭*:;,．★ ～☆*──────────╮

**`{{prefix}}ar enable`**
> First-time using my AR module? then look no further, enable the module before doing everything else!

**`{{prefix}}ar add <trigger> - <response>`**
> Let's add a new AR! fill the <trigger> with message you want me to listen and <response> as my response to it!
__e.g. {{prefix}}ar add welcome - enjoy your stay!__

**`{{prefix}}ar delete <id/trigger>`**
> Got bored with the AR? then it's time to delete it! fill the <id/trigger> with the AR you want to delete.
e.g. __{{prefix}}ar delete welcome__

**`{{prefix}}ar info`**
> Having hard time remembering all the ARs you just registered? let's check them through this action!

**`{{prefix}}ar reset`**
> How many ARs you've created already?! too many? oh well... restarting from scratch will be a better option I think.

**`{{prefix}}ar disable`**
> ARs aren't fun anymore? aw, don't worry then. You can disable the entire ARs anytime!

╰──────────☆～*:;,．*╯
AUTORESPONDER.INVALID_ACTION:
**Eeh, what action was that??** {{emoji}}
╰─I only accept {{actions}}.

╰─try type **`{{prefix}}ar add {{trigger}} <myResponseHere>`**

SETEXP.GUIDE:
This is your main control center for configuring the **EXP Leveling Module**. Below are the available actions you can use. {{emoji}}

╭*:;,．★ ～☆*──────────╮

**`{{prefix}}setexp enable`**
> By default, this module is automatically enabled after I got invited to this guild. But in case you've disabled it, you can enable the module again through this action.

**`{{prefix}}setexp disable`**
> Tired of getting in a level competition with your friend? you can disable the module anytime through this action.

**`{{prefix}}setexp add <user> <amount>`**
> Migrated from other bots? tired of grinding the exp? or probably just wanna have fun with a quick level jump? worry not, you can add some exp to yourself or other member.

**`{{prefix}}setexp minus <user> <amount>`**
> I know that some people are probably annoying and we want punish them for that behavior. With this action, you'll be able to decrease someone's exp or even yourself!

**`{{prefix}}setexp reset <user>`**
> Tired of being a high-leveled user? oh well, it can't be helped. This action allows you to turn yours or someone's exp account into a fresh slate.

╰──────────☆～*:;,．*╯
SETEXP.INVALID_ACTION: Sorry! but I only accept the following actions `{{actions}}`
SETEXP.INVALID_AMOUNT_TO_ADD:
**Oops**, please specify a valid number of exp you want me to add.
e.g. **`{{prefix}}setexp add @{{user}} 150`**
SETEXP.INVALID_AMOUNT_TO_MINUS:
Hmm, what even is that. You have to specify a valid number for the subtraction!
e.g. **`{{prefix}}setexp minus @{{user}} 50`**
SETEXP.MINUS_CONFIRMATION:
Are you sure you want to decrease {{user}}'s exp?
Below is the preview of their updated level card.
SETEXP.MINUS_OVERLIMIT: **Stop right there.** You cannot set {{user}}'s exp to below zero, *baka*. {{emoji}}
SETEXP.MISSING_AMOUNT_ON_ADD:
Hm? what's the amount of exp should I give?
e.g. **`{{prefix}}setexp add @{{user}} 500`**
SETEXP.MISSING_AMOUNT_ON_MINUS:
Hey, don't forget to specify the exp!
e.g. **`{{prefix}}setexp minus @{{user}} 100`**
SETEXP.MISSING_USER_ON_ADD:
Don't forget to specify the user that will receive the exp!
e.g. **`{{prefix}}setexp add @napu 500`**
SETEXP.MISSING_USER_ON_MINUS:
Who's should I subtract the exp from?
e.g. **`{{prefix}}setexp minus @napu 100`**
SETEXP.MISSING_USER_ON_RESET: Hm,.. whose exp should I reset? don't forget to specify the user, okay!? {{emoji}}

SETRANK.GUIDE:
This is your control center for configuring custom role-ranking system in the guild! now use the following actions to begin the configuration. {{emoji}}

╭*:;,．★ ～☆*──────────╮

**`{{prefix}}setrank enable`**
> If you are new to rank configuration, try use this action first and I'll guide you until the rest part.

**`{{prefix}}setrank add <role> <requiredLevel>`**
> This action registers the given role into the role-rank system and let you define the required level in order to get it.
e.g. __{{prefix}}setrank add @Kawaii 15__

**`{{prefix}}setrank delete <role>`**
> This action deletes the specified role from the rank system of this guild and make sure to have at least two registered role-rank before deleting it.
e.g. __{{prefix}}setrank delete @Kawaii__

**`{{prefix}}setrank info`**
> This action displays the current configurations of role-rank system in the guild.

**`{{prefix}}setrank stack`**
> Have you ever imagined keeping all your hard grinded roles? Now it is possible to stack them! just run this command once and it will be automatically toggled.

**`{{prefix}}setrank reset`**
> This action wipes out all the existing role-rank configuration in the guild and it'll use the default one. It's a good thing to-do if you want to start from scratch again.

**`{{prefix}}setrank disable`**
> This action disables the role-rank system in the guild. Although, your previous configuration won't be deleted and you can enable it again anytime.

╰──────────☆～*:;,．*╯

**`{{prefix}}setwelcomer theme <dark/light>`**
> Was the light mode too light for you? we all do. That's why I provided a dark theme, tehee.

**{{prefix}}setwelcomer multiple add <channel>**
> To add addition channel. **Must do `{{prefix}}setwelcomer` channel first**

{{prefix}}setwelcomer multiple remove <channel>**
> To remove addition channel.

**`{{prefix}}setwelcomer preview`**
> Wanna see how's your welcomer looks like before your comrades see it?

**`{{prefix}}setwelcomer disable`**
> Tired of spammy welcomer message? you can disable this module anytime.
